Congress. On Dec. 10, Sen. Bernie Sanders , an independent, took the floor of the Senate and didn't relinquish it for 8 1/2 hours. The book's publisher, Nation Books, says millions followed the speech online, crashing the Senate server. CEO title at Google to cofounder Larry Page NEW YORK( CNNMoney)-- Google CEO Eric Schmidt will step down from his role as Google's CEO in April and be replaced by co-founder Larry Page. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a prepared statement.
